DOC.brief_summary: This study aims at studying the natural history of Netherton syndrome (NS), to identify the consequences of LEKTI deficiency on the immune system and to characterize new molecular mechanisms involved in the disease.
DOC.brief_title: Natural History and Biological Study of Netherton Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Adult or child (no age limit) Confirmed diagnosis of Netherton syndrome Signed informed consent form for the patient or his legal representative Bleeding disorder precluding skin biopsy
